title.rendered: Luto Flat Glass Aluminum Frame Touch Switch

content.rendered:
Luto Smart Touch Switch is the new version of the smart touch switch in the Lumi smart home ecosystem. Acting as a communication device, the Luto flat glass touch switch helps users control home appliances via smartphones and voice. Not only scored in smart features, the Luto Flat Glass Aluminum Frame Touch Switch is also attractive with a flat tempered glass in 2 classic black or white colors, and a sharp aluminum frame with diamond-cut lines, bringing sophistication, luxury and elegance when installed on the wall.

Features

  • Using the Luto smart switch to replace normal mechanical switches, users can experience a smarter life which allows most device control commands in the home to be done via smartphone or voice.  
  • The smart switch connects to your phone via the central controller and uses Zigbee/BLE Mesh wireless connection to process and send commands.
  • Turn on/off devices with just a light touch on the switch
  • Control the entire lighting system in the house through smartphone and voice
  • Schedule, set timers to control devices such as water heaters, curtains …
  • Set up rules, scenes, and schedules for smart gadgets in the house to function simultaneously, as well as input and output signals to create smart living scenarios like eating, going home, and so on..

In general, as long as the device is controlled by a mechanical switch, it can be totally transformed into a smart device that can be operated via a smartphone and voice using the smart touch switch.

Lumi has successfully connected to virtual assistants like Google Assistant and Alexa. This allows you to experience the power of the voice. For example, if you say the command “OK GOOGLE, I’M HOME; Hey SIRI, I’M HOME,” all devices in the house will be totally switched on or off, depending on the command.

Advantages of Luto Flat Glass Aluminum Frame Touch Switch

Modern, sophisticated, elegant design

  • The Luto smart switch uses a tempered glass faceplate that is scratch-resistant and impact-resistant. It is combined with a LED ring around it, with the Lumi logo in the right corner, creating a highlight for the brand and a charming look for the product.
  • The LED light is always bright whether the switch is on or off, so you can see the smart touch switch even in the dark.

High durability

  • The Luto switch has a one-piece design with 1.2-2mm thick plastic to increase hardness and durability.
  • The solid aluminum frame uses anodizing technology to prevent oxidation and reduce the impact of bending during installation.
  • The solid aluminum frame has undergone complex processing to achieve a glossy and elegant finish.
  • PET protects the switch from paint and dust before the project is completed.

Good moisture resistance

The Luto switch ensure good water/moisture resistance during operation thanks to the addition of 4 rubber gasket positions:

  • Rubber gasket on the connector
  • Rubber gasket on the config button
  • Powershell gasket
  • Rubber cover for screw holes

 Safe and high sensitivity

  • The switch uses capacitive touch technology and isolated power, ensuring safety when using.
  • The design of the blue LED light (when turning off) and red light (when turning on) around the button makes it easy to find in the dark and protect eyesight.
  • Users can control it using Smartphone/Tablet via the Internet or by voice. In particular, the switch integrates overvoltage and overload protection; ensuring absolute safety for users during use.

igh compatibility and customization

  • The Luto smart switch has high compatibility with various types of recessed boxes on the market.
  • All Luto switches are high-power switches and are easily compatible between Smart Lighting and Smart Home.
  • Luto is also easy to customize to suit each family by setting the LED schedule on the smartphone, changing the brightness of the LED.

How Luto Flat Glass Aluminum Frame Touch Switch works

The Luto flat glass touch switch works by the control of the central controller (Home Controller).

The operation of the device will be demonstrated by the following example:

  • When the user issues the command “turn off the light” by touching the light button on the phone app, the command will be sent to the central controller via Zigbee/BLE Mesh.
  • From there, the HC controls the touch switch to turn on/off the light device as requested by the homeowner.

Video introducing the Lumi Smart Home solution

The following video describes the Lumi Smart Home solution:

The Luto Flat Glass Touch Switch with aluminum frame is more than simply a device for turning on and off devices; it’s a work of art that expresses sophistication and elegance. With the ability to integrate smart technology, you can connect the smart touch switch to a smart home system and control it remotely using your smartphone. Contact Lumi right now to design your home with elegance and modernity using models of switches such as flat glass switches, Luto smart switches to control single curtains, double curtains, and more.

excerpt.rendered:
• Scratch-resistant tempered glass 
  • Diamond-cut or rounded aluminum frame
  • Remote control via the internet/LAN network in the house (through the Lumi Life+ app)
  • Control by Rule, Scene, Schedule (Customized according to user needs).
  • Can control devices by voice through integration with Google Assistant, Alexa, Apple Siri
  • Safe, fireproof
  • Communication: Zigbee/BLE Mesh
  • Faceplate color: White/Black
  • Dimensions: Rectangle: 123 x 78 x 32.5 mm / Square: 95 x 95 x 32.5 mm
  • All are high-power switches
  • Warranty: 24 months
